pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"本镜像镜像了如下仓库："}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project.git"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如需克隆代码，使用"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git clone {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["由于仓库体积均较大，执行",["$r","code",null,{"children":"git clone"}],"可能需要较长时间，并且没有进度提示，请耐心等候。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"若要将 mirror 加入已有代码库，可在已有仓库中运行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git remote add mirror {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"或运行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git remote set-url origin {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"将默认上游设置为镜像站"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["注：如需要各个子项目的发布版本代码，请至 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/github-release/","children":"GitHub Release 镜像"}]," 中 llvm-project 一节。"]}]]}]

meta.title: LLVM Project Git 镜像使用帮助
